lead_paragraph: The State Department released this email that was sent to Hillary Clinton's private computer server from one of her top aides while she was secretary of state. The email, now classified, is at the center of a dispute over the handling of government data on her server.

headline.main: Email About North Korea on Hillary Clinton’s Server

snippet: The State Department released this email that was sent to Hillary Clinton's private computer server from one of her top aides while she was secretary of state. The email, now classified, is at the center of a dispute over the handling of government data on her server.
